Yeah - you didn't follow the instructions as follows.

-You need to use Phoenix 1.4 Beta 7 (Important, the latest 1.5 version skips stuff)

-Update the CDR in Phoenix

-Mount both dics on two different daemon tools drives

-Unpack the game in Phoenix and point to the second SID file when asked to. Let it unpack the whole thing.

-Double check that the Shogun folder is the size it needs to be.

-Run the cracktool, play, enjoy savegame corruption.

if you guys want to change the language of this game all u have to do is download the demo version of this game from steam and then go into your steam program files and exchange the local_en.pack and the local_patch_pack with the 2 of whatever language you have in your data folder, change the text in the language file to EN and trade the encyclopedia folder with the one in your steam program files for the game. Enjoy

If anyone is wanting to change the language, an easier way is to just delete all the unwanted language packs in the data folder. Then the game has no choice but to choose english, also change the language from ES to EN in the language.txt file. (same folder)

***UPDATE ONCE AGAIN***

This download is old and is missing tons of stuff, including the movies. If you want the complete version with all movies and DLC's do a search for:

Total War Shogun 2 v.1.10 + 3DLC RePack by R.G.Mechanics

R.G.Mechanics is Build 4247, so I don't think you'll need to download "Total War Shogun 2 : Rise of the Samurai + IkkoIkki & SJUP DLC + Latest Patch & Crack" patch. Either way, you'll still need "patch10.pack Build 4358" & "3DMGAME-Shogun2.v1.1.0.Build.4358.0.Crack.Fix2.Patch-3DM".

Do another search for:
 [FSrv] Total War Shogun 2 : Rise of the Samurai + IkkoIkki & SJUP DLC + Latest Patch & Crack

Anyone who's played Build 4247 knows how fucked up the game is. The latest patch, Build 4358, and crack are on the thread 35:
